definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: Today one-third of the people on Greenland earn their living in the fishing industry.
sentences.chinese: 今天格陵兰岛上有三分之一的人在捕鱼业中谋生。

sentences.english: 27The contoured surface of Jakobshavn Glacier at the fringe of the Greenland ice sheet, on July 19, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰冰原的边缘，雅各布冰川表面的异样形状。

sentences.english: Dr Pax Leonard describes the area as the "cultural centre of Greenland".
sentences.chinese: 莱奥纳多博士称这些地区是格陵兰的文化中心。

sentences.english: Denmark's territory includes the Faeroe Islands and Greenland in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦领土包括北极圈内的法罗群岛和格陵兰岛。

sentences.english: 33Drops of water fall from a melting iceberg near Nuuk, Greenland, on July 26, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰努克附近，从融化的冰山上流下的水滴。

sentences.english: Other sources, untapped as yet, include Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 其他来源，包括尚未开发的格陵兰。

sentences.english: Detailed view of an iceberg calved from glaciers on west Greenlandic coast.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰西海岸冰川上脱落冰山的清晰图像。

sentences.english: The unusual tides caused glaciers to calve icebergs off Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 这种不寻常的潮汐使得格陵兰的冰川崩裂成冰山。

sentences.english: The Inuits in Greenland are the World's northernmost settled population.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰的纽因特人是世界上最北方的居民。

sentences.english: Melting ice in Greenland threatens to raise sea levels.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰岛的融冰已威胁着海水的上涨。

sentences.english: 9A Greenland sled dog pup touches his mother's nose in Qeqertarsuaq, Greenland, on July 21, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 一只格陵兰的拉雪橇的小狗触碰母亲的鼻子。

sentences.english: The simulation of annual variability of sea ice in the Greenland Sea is not consistent with observation.
sentences.chinese: 模式未能在格陵兰海模拟出与观测一致的年际变化。

sentences.english: The Shetlanders are an island race.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的岛屿是格陵兰岛。

sentences.english: The East Greenland Current flows southward from the Arctic along the island’s eastern coast, carrying sea ice with it.
sentences.chinese: 携带着海冰，沿着格陵兰岛东海岸从北极向南流动。

definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
